/* MvmnAplyHistDao.selectMvmnAplyHistList */
SELECT A.APLYID , B.TME_SCHDLID , D.PRGRMID , PS.SAREAID , E.SAREA_NM , D.PRGRM_NM , D.OPER_FOM_CD , F.CD_NM OPER_FOM_NM , GROUP_CONCAT(REPLACE(B.DE, '.', '-')SEPARATOR' ') DE , C.TMEID , C.TME_NM , A.STTS_CD , G.CD_NM STTS_NM , D.APLCNT_DGSTFN_SRVYID , D.STDNT_DGSTFN_SRVYID , H.QESTNRID APLCNT_DGSTFN_QESTNRID , I.QESTNRID STDNT_DGSTFN_QESTNRID , J.SBMSNID , CASE WHEN J.SBMSN_DT IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END SBMSN_YN , DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') REG_DT , A.RGTRID FROM TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_APLY A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_APLY_SCHDL Z ON Z.APLYID = A.APLYID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_TME_SCHDL ORDER BY DE ASC) B ON B.TME_SCHDLID = Z.TME_SCHDLID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_TME C ON C.TMEID = B.TMEID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM D ON D.PRGRMID = C.PRGRMID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_SCHDL PS ON PS.PRGRM_SCHDLID = B.PRGRM_SCHDLID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EDU_SAREA E ON E.SAREAID = PS.SAREAID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CD F ON F.CD = D.OPER_FOM_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CD G ON G.CD = A.STTS_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_SRVY H ON H.SRVYID = D.APLCNT_DGSTFN_SRVYID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_SRVY I ON I.SRVYID = D.STDNT_DGSTFN_SRVYID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT SRVYID, SBMSNID, MVMN_PRGRM_APLYID, MAX(SBMSN_DT) SBMSN_DT FROM TB_CMM_SRVY_SBMSN GROUP BY SRVYID, MVMN_PRGRM_APLYID) J ON J.SRVYID = D.APLCNT_DGSTFN_SRVYID AND J.MVMN_PRGRM_APLYID = A.APLYID WHERE 1=1 AND A.USERID = #{user.userid} AND B.TME_SCHDLID IS NOT NULL
AND D.PRGRM_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchPrgrmNm},'%')
GROUP BY A.APLYID
/* MvmnAplyHistDao.selectMvmnSrvyInfo */ SELECT A.SRVYID , A.QESTNRID , A.SRVY_NM , A.SRVY_PRD_CD , A.BGNG_DE , A.END_DE , A.USE_YN FROM TB_CMM_SRVY A WHERE SRVYID = #{srvyid}

/* MvmnAplyHistDao.selectMvmnSrvySendList */ SELECT A.SBMSNID , A.SITEID , A.SRVYID , B.QESTNRID , A.MVMN_PRGRM_APLYID , A.USERID , A.PRTPNT_NM , DATE_FORMAT(A.SBMSN_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS SBMSN_DT_STR , A.MDFCN_DT , A.MDFRID , A.REG_DT , A.RGTRID FROM TB_CMM_SRVY_SBMSN A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_SRVY B ON A.SRVYID = B.SRVYID WHERE A.SRVYID = #{srvyid}
AND A.MVMN_PRGRM_APLYID = #{mvmnPrgrmAplyid}
